query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS camera_capture_log (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
  camera_id INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('success', 'failed', 'timeout', 'error') DEFAULT 'success' NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  image_id INT,
  image_url VARCHAR(1000),
  image_key VARCHAR(255),
  analysis_result ENUM('ok', 'ng', 'warning', 'pending', 'skipped') DEFAULT 'pending',
  quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  defects_found INT DEFAULT 0,
  capture_started_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  capture_completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  analysis_duration_ms INT,
  serial_number VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_capture_log_schedule (schedule_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_camera (camera_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_status (status),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_created (created_at)
);

  capture_completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,

  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_capture_log_schedule (schedule_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_camera (camera_id),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_status (status),
  INDEX idx_capture_log_created (created_at)
);
